alert.note: Alert for Banks; Barrow; Clarke; Jackson; Madison; Morgan; Oconee; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 21 at 4:29PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Oconee, Barrow, north central Morgan, Banks, Clarke, central Walton, Jackson and western Madison Counties through 500 PM EST ... At 429 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Homer to near Winder to near Jersey, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Winder, Monroe, Jefferson, Commerce, Watkinsville, Homer, Danielsville, Athens, Statham, Maysville, Arcade, Nicholson, Walnut Grove, Bogart, North High Shoals, Bethlehem, Pendergrass, Bostwick, Ila, and Between. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Banks; Barrow; Clarke; Jackson; Madison; Morgan; Oconee; Walton
